title: Mortgage Protection
body:
Mortgage Protection is a requirement from the bank for mortgage. It pays off the outstanding balance on a mortgage if you die. Itâ€™s primary role is to protect the bank, however it does have a benefit to the family as it reduces the mortgage   payment from any future outgoings. While this should be taken into account when considering the level of life cover a family require it should not be relied on completely.

Many banks quote for mortgage protection but a borrower is not obliged to accept their quote. They should research to find the best protection for them and review regularly.

If affordable a conversion option can be very useful if your loan or health circumstances change during the term.
